data.body: Set rusqlite with bundled SQLite in Cargo.toml and configure connection PRAGMAs: journal_mode=WAL, synchronous=NORMAL, foreign_keys=ON, temp_store=MEMORY, busy_timeout=5000.
data.description: Set rusqlite with bundled SQLite in Cargo.toml and configure connection PRAGMAs: journal_mode=WAL, synchronous=NORMAL, foreign_keys=ON, temp_store=MEMORY, busy_timeout=5000.
data.title: Configure rusqlite bundled and SQLite speed PRAGMAs
